passage.text: The absolute configuration of the title compound, C(14)H(13)NO(2)S, was assigned from the synthesis and confirmed by the structure determination. The central six-membered ring of the indolizine system adopts an envelope conformation, the greatest deviation from the mean plane of the ring being 0.459 (2) A for the N atom. The benzothieno system is planar [mean deviation = 0.009 (2) A]. In the crystal structure, mol-ecules form chains parallel to the b axis via inter-molecular O-H O hydrogen bonds.
